CAPABLE.Definition: able to do things effectively and skillfully, and to achieve results

FLUENTLY.Definition: if you speak a language or read fluently, you speak or read easily, well, and quickly

CURIOSITY.Definition: an eager wish to know or learn about something

SUBTITLES.Definition: words shown at the bottom of a movie or television picture to explain what is being said

CONTEXT.Definition: the situation within which something exists or happens, and that can help explain it

MISSION.Definition: any work that someone believes it is their duty to do

CREATIVITY.Definition: the ability to produce original and unusual ideas, or to make something new or imaginative

EFFORT.Definition: physical or mental activity needed to achieve something

DOCUMENT.Definition: to record the details of an event, a process, etc.

DIARY.Definition: a private record of events, thoughts, feelings, etc., that are written down every day, or a book where such things are recorded

INVESTING.Definition: to put money, effort, time, etc. into something to make a profit or get an advantage

DEDICATES.Definition: to give completely your energy, time, etc. to something

PASSIVE.Definition: existing or occurring without being active, open, or direct

HIGHLIGHTS.Definition: the best or most exciting, entertaining, or interesting part of something

DEFINITIONS.Definition: a statement that explains the meaning of a word or phrase

ACCESS.Definition: to be able to use or obtain something such as a service

METHOD.Definition: a particular way of doing something

VOCABULARY.Definition: all the words that exist in a particular language or subject

IRONED.Definition: to make clothes flat and smooth using an iron

WRINKLED.Definition: (of cloth) having small lines or folds in it

PREFER.Definition: to like, choose, or want one thing rather than another

PHILOSOPHY.Definition: the beliefs you have about how you should behave in particular situations in life

INEVITABLY.Definition: in a way that cannot be avoided

AMBITION.Definition: a strong wish to achieve something

INGREDIENTS.Definition: a food that is used with other foods in the preparation of a particular dish

LOOKING FORWARD TO.Definition: to feel pleased and excited about something that is going to happen

PHRASAL VERB.Definition: a phrase that consists of a verb with a preposition or adverb or both, the meaning of which is different from the meaning of its separate parts

A WATCHED POT NEVER BOILS.Definition: said to mean that if you wait and watch anxiously to see something happen, it will seem to take a very long time, or it will not happen at all

COUNTLESS.Definition: very many, or too many to be counted

SUBJECT.Definition: the thing that is being discussed, considered, or studied

CREEPY.Definition: strange or unnatural and making you feel frightened

AS FUCK.Definition: an extremely offensive expression used for emphasizing what you are saying

EVENTUALLY.Definition: in the end, especially after a long time or a lot of effort, problems, etc.

MEMORIZE.Definition: to learn something so that you will remember it exactly

CONVERSATIONAL.Definition: relating to or like a conversation

EASE.Definition: freedom from difficulty, effort, or pain

MASTER.Definition: to learn how to do something well

FUNDAMENTALS.Definition: the main or most important rules or parts

BITTER PILL.Definition: something that is very unpleasant but must be accepted

DON'T MENTION IT.Definition: said to be polite after someone has thanked you

ALTERNATIVES.Definition: offering a choice between two or more things

UNFORTUNATELY.Definition: used to say that something is sad, disappointing, or has a bad effect

INTERACT.Definition: to communicate with or react to

YOU CAN LEAD A HORSE TO WATER, BUT YOU C.Definition: used to emphasize that you can make it easy for someone to do something, but you cannot force them to do it

RESOURCES.Definition: something that can be used to help you

ENABLES.Definition: to make someone able to do something, or to make something possible

EFFECTIVENESS.Definition: the degree to which something is effective
